item.title: Everything about Crypto Coins
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: [vc_row css=\”.vc_custom_1452687555475{margin-bottom: 100px !important;}\”][vc_column offset=\”vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9\” css=\”.vc_custom_1452702342137{padding-right: 45px !important;}\”][vc_custom_heading source=\”post_title\” use_theme_fonts=\”yes\” el_class=\”no_stripe\”][stm_post_details][vc_column_text css=\”.vc_custom_1517386327783{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}\”]Crypterio is Cryptocurrency Investments and ICO Consulting WordPress […]
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=\”.vc_custom_1452687555475{margin-bottom: 100px !important;}\”][vc_column offset=\”vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9\” css=\”.vc_custom_1452702342137{padding-right: 45px !important;}\”][vc_custom_heading source=\”post_title\” use_theme_fonts=\”yes\” el_class=\”no_stripe\”][stm_post_details][vc_column_text css=\”.vc_custom_1517386327783{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}\”]Crypterio is Cryptocurrency Investments and ICO Consulting WordPress theme, that perfectly fits for any type of crypto-consulting project, including ICO Agencies, Bitcoin Traders, and private-practice ICO Advisors.

Those interested in opening a cryptocurrency consulting business, or launching their own cryptocurrency need to build a robust web presence, and StylemixThemes` Crypterio theme is tailor-made for just this purpose.

What might you find with this cryptocurrency WordPress theme? What makes it ideal as a Bitcoin WordPress Theme, or as an ICO Consulting Theme?

Crypterio offers three different layouts, each of which is designed for a different purpose. For instance, you can create an ICO Landing Page for your specific ICO project, or you can create a full-blown website to advertise your services as an ICO Agency or as an ICO Advisor and Cryptocurrency Expert. Furthermore, you can also use this cryptocurrency consulting WordPress theme to create a website that showcases your services as a Blockchain Consulting Company.

Get Crypterio Now! On ThemeForest.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=\”.vc_custom_1517386110446{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}\”]

Crypterio Specials

With Crypterio theme you’ll get a powerful WordPress solution for an ICO Landing Page, a professional web-site for ICO Advisor and/or Cryptocurrency Consulting business.

Advanced ICO Launching Countdown

ICO development agencies and Blockchain technology consulting business can utilize tailor-made special features like ICO ticker module ready for ICO gateway integration.

Now you’re ready to pack your professional website with great content that will engage and inspire potential customers. Choose how you want to display your services and case studies, for maximum impact into your cryptocurrency business.

Live Exchange Rates Graph & Cryptocurrency Converter

To provide your customers with complex information we’ve developed the Live Exchange Rates Graph based on public API. A choice of templates, including custom pie charts, graphs and progress bars, gives you a range of dynamic and compelling options for showing your clients what you can do.

You can use more cryptocurrency widgets with Virtual Coin Widgets Plugin included into Crypterio for free.
The plugin provides 10 widgets for your crypto-project and supports 1000+ cryptocurrencies.

You can convert cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, DASH, Litecoin, Ripple, ZCash and 1000+ others to fiat currencies in real-time rates. You can control and add or remove as many currencies as you want.

Cryptocurrency rates based on the data provided by exchanges APIs. All rates are for information purposes. Since rates for actual transactions may vary we are not offering to enter into any transaction at any rate displayed in the Crypterio Theme.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=\”.vc_custom_1452700243026{margin-bottom: 39px !important;}\”][vc_column_inner width=\”1/2\”][vc_column_text]

  • Virtual Coin Widgets:
    Virtual Coin Widgets included into Crypterio for free and offers 10 widgets with 1000+ cryptocurrencies. Exchange Rates are updated every 10 minutes. 
  • Multilingual & Translation Ready:
    Crypterio is 100% WPML compatible, so you can use the WPML plugin to translate your website into any language.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=\”1/2\”][vc_column_text]

  • WPBakery Page Builder:
    The optimized Visual Composer builder has a restyled back-end interface that puts all of the custom Crypterio modules at your fingertips.
  • Loading Speed Optimization:
    Crypterio has been optimized for speed, with perfect page loading on GTMetrix, Google PageSpeed and Pingdom.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][stm_post_bottom][stm_post_about_author][stm_post_comments][/vc_column][vc_column width=\”1/4\” offset=\”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs\”][stm_sidebar sidebar=\”527\”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=\”stretch_row\” el_class=\”third_bg_color\” css=\”.vc_custom_1451889219674{margin-bottom: -60px !important;}\”][vc_column][vc_cta h2=\”Looking for a First-Class ICO and Bitсoin Investments Consultant?\” h2_font_container=\”tag:h2|font_size:20px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:24px\” h2_use_theme_fonts=\”yes\” shape=\”square\” style=\”flat\” add_button=\”right\” btn_title=\”get a quote\” btn_style=\”flat\” btn_color=\”theme_style_2\” btn_align=\”right\” btn_i_align=\”right\” btn_i_icon_fontawesome=\”fas fa-chevron-right\” use_custom_fonts_h2=\”true\” btn_button_block=\”true\” btn_add_icon=\”true\” el_class=\”third_bg_color\” css=\”.vc_custom_1629095199584{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}\” btn_link=\”url:https%3A%2F%2Fcrypterio.stylemixthemes.com%2Fcontact-three%2F|title:Contact%20three\”][/vc_cta][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: ICO & Crytpocurrency WP Theme
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: [vc_row css=\”.vc_custom_1452687555475{margin-bottom: 100px !important;}\”][vc_column offset=\”vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9\” css=\”.vc_custom_1452702342137{padding-right: 45px !important;}\”][vc_custom_heading source=\”post_title\” use_theme_fonts=\”yes\” el_class=\”no_stripe\”][stm_post_details][vc_column_text css=\”.vc_custom_1517386327783{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}\”]Crypterio is Cryptocurrency Investments and ICO Consulting WordPress […]
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=\”.vc_custom_1452687555475{margin-bottom: 100px !important;}\”][vc_column offset=\”vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9\” css=\”.vc_custom_1452702342137{padding-right: 45px !important;}\”][vc_custom_heading source=\”post_title\” use_theme_fonts=\”yes\” el_class=\”no_stripe\”][stm_post_details][vc_column_text css=\”.vc_custom_1517386327783{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}\”]Crypterio is Cryptocurrency Investments and ICO Consulting WordPress theme, that perfectly fits for any type of crypto-consulting project, including ICO Agencies, Bitcoin Traders, and private-practice ICO Advisors.

Those interested in opening a cryptocurrency consulting business, or launching their own cryptocurrency need to build a robust web presence, and StylemixThemes` Crypterio theme is tailor-made for just this purpose.

What might you find with this cryptocurrency WordPress theme? What makes it ideal as a Bitcoin WordPress Theme, or as an ICO Consulting Theme?

Crypterio offers three different layouts, each of which is designed for a different purpose. For instance, you can create an ICO Landing Page for your specific ICO project, or you can create a full-blown website to advertise your services as an ICO Agency or as an ICO Advisor and Cryptocurrency Expert. Furthermore, you can also use this cryptocurrency consulting WordPress theme to create a website that showcases your services as a Blockchain Consulting Company.

Get Crypterio Now! On ThemeForest.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=\”.vc_custom_1517386110446{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}\”]

Crypterio Specials

With Crypterio theme you’ll get a powerful WordPress solution for an ICO Landing Page, a professional web-site for ICO Advisor and/or Cryptocurrency Consulting business.

Advanced ICO Launching Countdown

ICO development agencies and Blockchain technology consulting business can utilize tailor-made special features like ICO ticker module ready for ICO gateway integration.

Now you’re ready to pack your professional website with great content that will engage and inspire potential customers. Choose how you want to display your services and case studies, for maximum impact into your cryptocurrency business.

Live Exchange Rates Graph & Cryptocurrency Converter

To provide your customers with complex information we’ve developed the Live Exchange Rates Graph based on public API. A choice of templates, including custom pie charts, graphs and progress bars, gives you a range of dynamic and compelling options for showing your clients what you can do.

You can use more cryptocurrency widgets with Virtual Coin Widgets Plugin included into Crypterio for free.
The plugin provides 10 widgets for your crypto-project and supports 1000+ cryptocurrencies.

You can convert cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, Ethereum, DASH, Litecoin, Ripple, ZCash and 1000+ others to fiat currencies in real-time rates. You can control and add or remove as many currencies as you want.

Cryptocurrency rates based on the data provided by exchanges APIs. All rates are for information purposes. Since rates for actual transactions may vary we are not offering to enter into any transaction at any rate displayed in the Crypterio Theme.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=\”.vc_custom_1452700243026{margin-bottom: 39px !important;}\”][vc_column_inner width=\”1/2\”][vc_column_text]

  • Virtual Coin Widgets:
    Virtual Coin Widgets included into Crypterio for free and offers 10 widgets with 1000+ cryptocurrencies. Exchange Rates are updated every 10 minutes. 
  • Multilingual & Translation Ready:
    Crypterio is 100% WPML compatible, so you can use the WPML plugin to translate your website into any language.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=\”1/2\”][vc_column_text]

  • WPBakery Page Builder:
    The optimized Visual Composer builder has a restyled back-end interface that puts all of the custom Crypterio modules at your fingertips.
  • Loading Speed Optimization:
    Crypterio has been optimized for speed, with perfect page loading on GTMetrix, Google PageSpeed and Pingdom.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][stm_post_bottom][stm_post_about_author][stm_post_comments][/vc_column][vc_column width=\”1/4\” offset=\”vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs\”][stm_sidebar sidebar=\”527\”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=\”stretch_row\” el_class=\”third_bg_color\” css=\”.vc_custom_1451889219674{margin-bottom: -60px !important;}\”][vc_column][vc_cta h2=\”Looking for a First-Class ICO and Bitсoin Investments Consultant?\” h2_font_container=\”tag:h2|font_size:20px|text_align:left|color:%23000000|line_height:24px\” h2_use_theme_fonts=\”yes\” shape=\”square\” style=\”flat\” add_button=\”right\” btn_title=\”get a quote\” btn_style=\”flat\” btn_color=\”theme_style_2\” btn_align=\”right\” btn_i_align=\”right\” btn_i_icon_fontawesome=\”fas fa-chevron-right\” use_custom_fonts_h2=\”true\” btn_button_block=\”true\” btn_add_icon=\”true\” el_class=\”third_bg_color\” css=\”.vc_custom_1629095167745{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}\” btn_link=\”url:https%3A%2F%2Fcrypterio.stylemixthemes.com%2Fcontact-three%2F|title:Contact%20three\”][/vc_cta][/vc_column][/vc_row]
